description: Convert various media file types using an `aiffmpeg` processor powered pipeline. You can use the processor in other pipelines to transform generated files.

cookbook_cards.title: FFMpeg Conversion
cookbook_cards.description: Use this pipeline to convert media files with conversational language using FFmpeg. Uploads are limited in size to 32MB.

cookbook_cards.title: FFMpeg Callback
cookbook_cards.description: Use this pipeline to catch the callback from the `aiffmpeg` processor. Displays the output from the first pipeline in the logs tab.
